purpose: Manages global image generation settings persisted to localStorage, with optional forwarding of changes to an external sync callback
Assembles AI image-generation prompts for entities by combining entity guidance, cultural identities, world context, narrative events, and style selections into structured prompt payloads
Orchestrates the entity summary revision workflow by loading full entity data, mapping it to revision context, and dispatching batch revision requests to the backend
Loads and manages the narrative style library from persistent storage, exposing the library data, loading state, and functions to save or reset custom styles
Drives a background summary-revision run by dispatching entity batches for AI rewriting, polling for results, and exposing run state and controls for auto and manual mode
Exposes tone-ranking progress, assignment previews, and control actions (prepare, confirm, cancel) as a thin accessor over the tone-ranking store
Renders a set of badges showing which generators, systems, or other items reference a given domain object, or an orphan indicator when none do
Re-exports ToolUsageBadges from the badges module as a convenience barrel export
Re-exports DetailUsageBadges from the badges module as a convenience barrel export
Renders compact icon-and-count badges for each tool (e.g. Name Forge, Coherence Engine) that references a domain object, with optional zero-count display and compact mode
Renders a searchable, filterable, groupable matrix table showing cell-level coverage values between a set of row items and column categories, with click handlers for rows and cells
Manages list-editor state (selected item, add, remove, rename, reorder) for an array of items with optional localStorage persistence of the current selection
Buffers an external value in local state so controlled inputs can be edited freely, then flushes changes to the parent via a callback when the user commits
Entry-point component for the Chronicle creation wizard that gates rendering on an isOpen flag and wraps the inner wizard steps with a WizardProvider context
Provides wizard state and dispatch to child steps via context, initialising entity-kind-to-category mapping and exposing it alongside reducer-managed step and selection state
Reads Chronicle wizard state and dispatch from context and throws if consumed outside a WizardProvider
Provides Chronicle wizard state and dispatch to child steps via context, initialising entity-kind-to-category mapping and exposing it alongside reducer-managed step and selection state
Reads Chronicle wizard state and dispatch from context and throws if consumed outside a WizardProvider
Derives a sorted array of lightweight chronicle nav items from the chronicle store for display in the sidebar list, with optional effective-status override per chronicle
Returns the full chronicle record for a given ID from the store, re-rendering only when that specific record reference changes
Returns the total number of chronicles currently held in the store for use in stats displays
Returns the full entity nav-item map from the entity store for O(1) ID-based lookups
Returns a stable array of entity nav items derived from the nav-item map for use in list rendering
Returns the nav item for a single entity ID from the store, re-rendering only when that specific nav item changes
Returns the cached full entity record for a given ID from the bounded entity cache, returning undefined until explicitly loaded
Returns the total number of entity nav items in the store, re-rendering only when the count changes
Returns the prominence scale thresholds from the index store, falling back to a default scale when indexes are not yet loaded
Returns the renowned prominence threshold from the index store for filtering or display purposes
Returns the ordered array of era temporal entries from the index store for timeline and era-aware computations
Returns a memoized map of era temporal entries keyed by both era ID and era aliases for efficient lookup by any era identifier
Returns a record mapping each culture to its list of prominent entity IDs and names from the index store
Returns the full array of narrative events from the narrative event store, re-rendering when events change
Returns the count of narrative events in the store for display in stats or conditional rendering
Returns the full flat array of persisted relationships from the relationship store
Returns the precomputed by-entity relationship index from the store for efficient per-entity relationship lookups
Returns all relationships involving a specific entity ID from the precomputed index, or an empty array if the entity has none
Returns the total count of persisted relationships in the store
Renders a small SVG line chart with a filled area showing event intensity over a tick range, with optional highlighted selection band
Renders an interactive SVG brush control that lets users drag or resize a tick-range selection over a simulation timeline
Renders an SVG timeline showing narrative events as colored dots across era bands, with hover tooltips and optional cast-marker track for toggling event inclusion
Renders a row of toggle chip buttons for single or multi-select filtering from a set of labeled options with optional color coding
Renders an SVG radar chart visualizing a chronicle's story-potential scores across multiple narrative axes with optional interactivity and axis labels
Wraps StoryPotentialRadar with a numeric overall score displayed below the chart for use in detail views
Renders a compact SVG filled bar proportional to a 0-1 story score for use in list item summaries
Renders a row of filled and empty dots representing a story score rounded to the nearest integer out of a configurable maximum
Renders a small SVG radial graph showing a focal entity at the center with up to eight connected entities arranged in an orbit
Renders an interactive SVG constellation diagram of cast candidates orbiting an entry-point entity, color-coded by era, with selection highlighting and hover tooltips
Renders a role assignment slot in the cast builder showing current assignees, capacity state, and controls to assign, remove, or toggle primary status for entities
Renders a detail card for a candidate entity showing its name, kind, era, prominence metrics, and whether it is the ensemble entry point or already assigned
Renders a segmented bar showing how many entity categories from the candidate pool have been filled by current cast assignments, highlighting gaps
Wraps StoryPotentialRadar with a numeric overall score displayed below the chart for use in detail views
Renders a compact SVG filled bar proportional to a 0-1 story score for use in list item summaries
Renders a row of filled and empty dots representing a story score rounded to the nearest integer out of a configurable maximum
Manages a Web Worker running the world simulation, exposing run state, progress, and controls (start, pause, resume, stop) while cleaning up the worker on unmount
